### Quick Install

**Linux/macOS:**
```bash
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mbround18/ignite/main/install.sh | bash
```

Or with a specific version:
```bash
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mbround18/ignite/main/install.sh | bash -s -- --version v{{VERSION}}
```

**Windows (PowerShell):**
```powershell
irm https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mbround18/ignite/main/install.ps1 | iex
```

Or with a specific version:
```powershell
irm https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mbround18/ignite/main/install.ps1 | iex -ArgumentList "-Version v{{VERSION}}"
```

### Manual Installation

Download the appropriate binary for your platform from the assets below.

### Upgrading

To upgrade to the latest version, re-run the install script:

Linux/macOS:

```bash
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mbround18/ignite/main/install.sh | bash
```

Windows (PowerShell):

```powershell
irm https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mbround18/ignite/main/install.ps1 | iex
```

Install a specific version:

```bash
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mbround18/ignite/main/install.sh | bash -s -- --version v{{VERSION}}
```

```powershell
irm https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mbround18/ignite/main/install.ps1 | iex -ArgumentList "-Version v{{VERSION}}"
```
